thread.title: Norway wants to be included in Brexit talks between UK and EU leaders
thread.title_full: Norway wants to be included in Brexit talks between UK and EU leaders | The Independent

author: Samuel Osborne
title: Norway wants to be included in Brexit talks between UK and EU leaders
text:
Norway would like to be included in any arrangements between Britain and the European Union during the Brexit process, the country's EU minister has said. 
"We would like to have the possibility to be included in EU-UK arrangements concerning the internal market, permanent as well as transitional," the Norwegian EEA and EU minister, Frank Bakke-Jensen , said in a speech to EU ambassadors in Oslo. 
The Nordic country is not a member of the EU but pays for access to the European common market via the European Economic Area (EEA) agreement.
More follows
